snippet: The killers of the ethnic Armenian journalist Hrant Dink did not act alone but were part of a criminal conspiracy,  an appeals court ruled on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: The killers of the ethnic Armenian journalist Hrant Dink did not act alone but were part of a criminal conspiracy,  an appeals court ruled on Wednesday.

headline.seo: Turkish Court Sees Conspiracy in Journalist’s Death
headline.main: Turkish Court Sees Conspiracy in Journalist’s Death
headline.print_headline: Turkish Court Sees Conspiracy in Journalist’s Death
